title: Socket-outlets requiring isolating switches
fullText:
Socket-outlets that are not readily accessible and are not protected by a dedicated LPD shall be provided with a separate, readily accessible isolating switch that operates in all live (active and neutral) conductors in accordance with Clause 2.10.
Socket-outlets mounted under benches or in cupboards are not readily accessible if they are obstructed by equipment. Socket-outlets that are not readily accessible and that are protected by a dedicated LPD shall be provided with a readily accessible test facility in accordance with Clause 2.8.7. Isolation switches shall not be located within 500 mm of the light switch at the entrance of the room.
